hibernate-mapping.query: select spec.id from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen spec where spec.barcode = ? and spec.activityStatus= ?
Select specimen.consentTierStatusCollection from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen WHERE specimen.label = ?
Select specimen.availableQuantity from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen WHERE specimen.label = ? and specimen.isAvailable=? and specimen.activityStatus='Active'
Update edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen SET specimen.availableQuantity=?,specimen.isAvailable=? where specimen.label=?
Update edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen SET specimen.activityStatus='Closed' where specimen.label=?
Update edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen SET specimen.activityStatus='Disabled' where specimen.label=?
Select specimen.id from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen where specimen.label=?
select spec.id from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen spec where spec.label = ? and spec.activityStatus= ?
select spec.label from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen spec where spec.id = ? and spec.activityStatus= ?
select spec.label from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen spec where spec.id = ?
Update edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen SET specimen.activityStatus='Disabled' where specimen.specimenCollectionGroup.id=?
select specimen.specimenCollectionGroup.collectionProtocolRegistration.collectionProtocol.id from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen as specimen where specimen.id=?

select scg.identifiedSurgicalPathologyReport.id from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.SpecimenCollectionGroup as scg, edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen as specimen where specimen.id = ? and specimen.id in elements(scg.specimenCollection)
select spec.id from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen spec where spec.label = ? or spec.barcode = ?

select specimen.id, specimen.specimenCollectionGroup.id, specimen.specimenCollectionGroup.collectionProtocolRegistration.collectionProtocol.id from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen as specimen where (specimen.label = ? or specimen.barcode = ?) and specimen.activityStatus= ?
select specimen.specimenPosition.storageContainer.site.id from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen where (specimen.id=? or specimen.label=? ) and specimen.activityStatus=?

select specimen.activityStatus,scg.id, specimen.id, specimen.label, specimen.barcode, specimen.specimenClass, specimen.specimenType, specimen.pathologicalStatus, specimenCharacteristics.tissueSite, specimen.specimenCharacteristics.tissueSide, specimen.availableQuantity, specimen.concentrationInMicrogramPerMicroliter,specimen.initialQuantity, specimen.isAvailable from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen left join specimen.specimenCollectionGroup scg left join specimen.specimenCharacteristics specimenCharacteristics where specimen.label=?
select specimen.specimenCollectionGroup.collectionProtocolRegistration.collectionProtocol.id from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen as specimen where specimen.id = ?
select specimen.specimenCollectionGroup.collectionProtocolRegistration.collectionProtocol.id from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen as specimen where specimen.label = ?

select specimen.activityStatus,scg.id, specimen.id, specimen.label, specimen.barcode, specimen.specimenClass, specimen.specimenType, specimen.pathologicalStatus, specimenCharacteristics.tissueSite, specimen.specimenCharacteristics.tissueSide, specimen.availableQuantity, specimen.concentrationInMicrogramPerMicroliter,specimen.initialQuantity, specimen.isAvailable from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen left join specimen.specimenCollectionGroup scg left join specimen.specimenCharacteristics specimenCharacteristics where specimen.barcode=?

select specimen.label,specimen.barcode from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen as specimen where (specimen.label = ? or specimen.barcode = ?) and specimen.activityStatus = 'Active' and specimen.collectionStatus='Collected'
from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen as specimen where specimen.label = ? and specimen.activityStatus= ?
from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen as specimen where specimen.barcode = ? and specimen.activityStatus= ?
select specimen.specimenCharacteristics from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen where specimen.id=?

select specimen.id,specimen.label from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen as specimen where specimen.specimenCollectionGroup.id = ? and specimen.collectionStatus='Collected' and specimen.activityStatus = 'Active' order by specimen.label
